update t_billing_record set order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, billing_no = #{billingNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, billing_date = #{billingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, contract_code = #{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_serial_no = #{orderSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, billing_sum = #{billingSum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, buyer = #{buyer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, saler = #{saler,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buyer_tax_id = #{buyerTaxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, saler_tax_id = #{salerTaxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, directions = #{directions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attachment1 = #{attachment1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_name = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where br_id = #{brId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from t_billing_record
and billing_no like concat('%',#{billingNo},'%')
and contract_code like concat('%',#{contractCode},'%')
and order_serial_no like concat('%', #{orderSerialNo} ,'%')
and (billing_date > #{billingDateStart} and billing_date < #{billingDateEnd})
and buyer like concat('%',#{buyer},'%')
and company_id = #{companyId}
